title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Science Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding and applying basic science concepts in professional tasks
context.additional_context: Supplementary learning support via smartphone utilization, emphasizing practical application through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three types of cognitive load theory (intrinsic, extraneous, and germane load)
Learners can evaluate the difficulty level of learning materials with over 80% accuracy using a cognitive load measurement questionnaire when designing science content
Learners can develop a science education scenario applying strategies to minimize extraneous load and maximize germane load in project-based assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
